body: I can't seem to get on the server I was playing it a few minutes ago. When the Nexus game I was playing restarted it said unable to connect to fallback server.
body_tagged: I can't seem to get on the server I was playing it a few minutes ago. When the Nexus game I was playing restarted it said unable to connect to fallback server.
title: Is the server down?

replies.body: It may be just your internet, or there could be a small update.
replies.body_tagged: It may be just your internet, or there could be a small update.

replies.body: Still can't log in. Keeps saying this.
replies.body_tagged: Still can't log in. Keeps saying this.

replies.body:
Try using alt ips
For some reason the normal Avicus Ip (avic.us) don't send information to my client (or something like dat) so i use test.avic.us

replies.body:
It is hard to get in at the moment. 
Try to use an alternate IP such as...
skywars.co
mc-hg.org
wallsmc.com
